name: Débris Noirs
description:
Warning: Be ready to remove your virtual reality headset if you are disoriented or experiencing motion sickness. Please read the controls below before starting the application.

This is a 2D--not 3D--virtual reality game for Google Cardboard.

Survive against endless waves of space débris and aim for a personal highscore.

Controls:

This game needs to orient itself: make sure to hold the screen left horizontal on startup so the game knows which way is forward and up.

Use your neck to control the game; the direction of your gaze controls how you move.

While alive the ship automatically fires projectiles forward, but as a ghost the ship will not fire until it respawns.

While alive, look right to rotate the ship clockwise.
While alive, look left to rotate the ship counter-clockwise.
While alive, look up to accelerate the ship forward.

While a ghost, you can look at the ship to respawn.
While a ghost, you can look in the direction you want to move for free-fly mode.
